name: Lightboxing
description:
This clip has taken quite a journey, I recorded the initial take on the track you should be hearing right now (turn on the sound, plz) somewhere around the end of the 2000s. I think it was recorded in 2008 or 2009 but I was working 60 hours a week at that point and it's fuzzy.

The visuals are combination of my main three techniques for video work: VQGAN+CLIP generated animation, TouchDesigner for noise, animation and compositing, and live video synthesis courtesy of a Raspberry Pi running Artificial Life. 

Artificial Life is Open Frameworks based, TouchDesigner is GLSL for it's shaders afaik.
